author: Rebecca Klar
title: Protestors demonstrate against coronavirus restrictions in Pennsylvania
description: Protestors gathered in Harrisburg, Pa. on Monday to demonstrate against a statewide stay-at-home order put in place in response to the coronavirus pandemic. Video footage shows crowds gathering b...
content:
Protestors gathered in Harrisburg, Pa. on Monday to demonstrate against a statewide stay-at-home order put in place in response to the coronavirus pandemic. 
Video footage shows crowds gathering by the state capitol building, with only some wearing the recom… [+2707 chars]
